metadata.feature_description: Analytics for discussion forums showing thread activity and participation metrics

steps.actual: Login successful, redirected to home page
Dashboard menu expanded showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens with module tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, etc.)
steps.actual: Panel failed to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)

issues: JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics panel from initializing: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempted to access Discussions tab in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Discussion thread metrics displayed (views, replies, engagement)
steps.actual: Could not access Discussions tab - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot view discussion thread metrics because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempted to access Discussions engagement metrics
steps.expected: Reply rates and engagement percentages displayed
steps.actual: Could not access feature - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot track reply rates and engagement because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to view active discussion topics in analytics
steps.expected: List of active discussion topics with activity metrics
steps.actual: Could not access feature - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot monitor active discussion topics because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to view thread popularity rankings
steps.expected: Popular content list showing discussion threads ranked by views/engagement
steps.actual: Could not access feature - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test thread popularity ranking because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to verify discussion-specific analytics data
steps.expected: Discussion-specific metrics (create count, view count, engagement stats) displayed correctly
steps.actual: Could not access feature - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot verify discussion-specific data because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to analyze discussion trends using time period filters
steps.expected: Line charts and graphs showing discussion trends over selected time periods (Day/Week/Month/Year)
steps.actual: Could not access feature - Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot analyze discussion trends because Community Analytics panel fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

observations: Critical JavaScript error in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
The error occurs during dashboardClass.init() when trying to serialize custom date for default settings
This error prevents the entire Community Analytics panel from loading, blocking access to all module-specific analytics (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Social Events, Ideas, Wiki)
Code review shows the social-dashboard-instance.js calls utility.serializeCustomDate() at line 1027 but this function is not available in the utility object
The menu navigation to Dashboard > Community Analytics works correctly, but the panel content fails to render
This appears to be a regression or missing dependency issue in the PersonaBar utility module
